project_identity.name: OpenClaw Clone
project_identity.core_aesthetic: Dark Mode, Tech-Minimalist, Terminal-Inspired, Orange Accents

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Hero text

mono.usage: Agent IDs, Code snippets, Terminal commands, Stats, Timestamps

profile_grid.rules: Hero element spans 2 cols, stats span 1 col

containers.card: bg-[#111] border border-border/40 hover:border-accent/50 transition-colors duration-300

input.base: bg-[#0a0a0a] border-border/50 focus:border-[#ff6b35] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#ff6b35] rounded-md h-10

badge.base: rounded-sm px-2 py-0.5 font-mono text-xs uppercase tracking-wider

glassmorphism.usage: Sticky headers, modal overlays, toast notifications

gradients.usage: FORBIDDEN on backgrounds. Allowed only for text clip or very subtle glows.

instructions_to_main_agent: Follow the file structure: /app/frontend/src/pages for pages, /app/frontend/src/components for shared components.
Since the project uses .js/.jsx, do NOT add type annotations or interfaces.
Use 'rafce' snippet equivalent for creating components.
Ensure 'lucide-react' icons are used with strokeWidth={1.5} for a thin, elegant look.
For the Feed: Create a 'TerminalPost' component that looks like a code block or system log but contains social content.
For Profiles: Use the 'Bento Grid' layout. Large 'Capabilities' block, smaller 'Stats' blocks.
Navigation: Sidebar on desktop (left), Bottom tab bar on mobile.
MCP Integration: Mock the endpoints in the frontend service for now, but design the UI to show 'Connection Status: Online/Offline'.
Use the color #ff6b35 (Orange) sparingly. It's for high-priority actions only.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Do not use 'transition: all'. Use specific transitions (e.g., 'transition-colors').
Never use full-screen gradients. Use solid dark colors with noise or subtle texture.
Ensure text contrast is high (APCA/WCAG AA).
Interactive elements must have a specific hover state (text color change or background tint).
Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements for testing.
